oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parameter extraction for PSP MOSFET model using particle swarm optimization
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: THAKKER, RA
GANDHI, N
PATIL, MB
ANIL, KG
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mosfet parameter extraction
particle swarm optimization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper demonstrates the application of Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) for parameter extraction of MOSFET model for the first time. Parameters are extracted for PSP MOS model for 65 nm technology NMOS devices. It has been shown that the performance of the PSO algorithm is better than the Genetic Algorithm (GA) in terms of accuracy and consistency.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PROCEEDINGS OF THE 2007 INTERNATIONAL WORKSHOP ON THE PHYSICS OF SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICES: IWPSD-2007,130-133
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 14th International Workshop on the Physics of Semiconductor Devices,Mumbai, INDIA,DEC 17-20, 2007
